aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.first: Hi, I'm Anghelo Alva, student of Ing. Informaticts and in my free time I develop web applications.
aboutMe.second: I'm a passionate about the web, I like to create web applications that help people to solve their problems and make their lives easier, always designing the best user experience and the best performance i can.
aboutMe.third: I don't have experience in a real job, but I feel that I'm ready to start working in a company, I have the skills and the knowledge to start working in a company and I'm ready to learn more and improve my skills.
aboutMe.contact: If you want to contact me, you can send me an email to:
